title: (x) 3D3 stright angled script - similar to FIG Script, Gretel {Stephen}
content:
Hello,  
I am looking for the font that composed the title “3d3” or something similar to that.  
 [http://www.concours-3d3.com/images/visuaccueil2005.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010143353/http:/www.concours-3d3.com/images/visuaccueil2005.jpg "http://www.concours-3d3.com/images/visuaccueil2005.jpg")

any idea ?

doc

 [‹ (x) Surrender must cry live have paint be - Times New Roman {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010143353/http:/typophile.com/node/19652 "Go to previous forum topic") ["Malkin" modern Arts & Crafts display sans ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010143353/http:/typophile.com/node/19675 "Go to next forum topic")
author: docunagi

comments.content: I’ll bet that was custom made. You might like [FIG](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010143353/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=PRC.123372.0.0) or [Gretel](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010143353/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=FT.123354.0.0).
